resources.string: Change the order of resolving artwork
Specify formatting pattern of a sentence to post
Track name: TI, Artist name: AR, Album name: AL
Specify prefix / suffix for each patterns
Authenticate Spotify account for using Spotify API
Use Spotify API as data source for track information if possible
Generate sharing text if all of specified format patterns are satisfied
Enable auto post with Mastodon mode
Authenticate Mastodon account for auto post
Set margin time to determine auto post for Mastodon
Select visibility of auto post for Mastodon
Select which player apps can be used for auto post for Mastodon
Show short notification on succeeded to post for Mastodon
Show notification when you play music
Select the color for colorizing notification
Choose from color palette which is based on the artwork
Set background color to sharing notification
Show the artwork in sharing widget
Launch music player app which now playing
Show clear button for track information in sharing widget
Authenticate Twitter account for share from Wear
Please donate for unlock this feature
Please grant permissions\nto use this app by tap here
Please grant permissions\nto use this app by open device setting
Specify prefix / suffix for each identifier
Reorder by D\'n\'D, toggle enabled by switch
Specify formatting pattern of a sentence to post

Track name: TI
Artist name: AR
Album name: AL
Composer name: CO
Player name: PN
Spotify URL: SU *Authentication required
escape sequence: Wrap by ' '
line break: \n
Select visibility of auto post for Mastodon
Specify which player apps can be used for auto post for Mastodon
Colors are extracted from artwork\'s key colors
Failure to start the purchase process
Open system settings to grant permission for listen notifications
Failure to authenticate the Spotify account
Failure to authenticate the Twitter account
Failure to authenticate the Mastodon account
Input value is invalid. Change value and try again.
To share, you must authorize your Twitter account
Please set ignoring battery optimization setting as "ON" for this app in order to let the app working properly
Succeeded to authenticate the Spotify account.
Succeeded to authenticate the Twitter account.
Failed to authenticate the Twitter account.
Succeeded to authenticate the Mastodon account.
